pages.text: The Kraken it's a terrifying creature that can be found in the depths of any Ocean except in the Frozen Oceans.$(br2)Be careful if you are in a boat, because this creature has the hability to destroy them and make player drown faster than normal.$(br2)On death, they may drops Kraken Tooth.
You can use those Kraken Tooths to craft a Trident.
